source.3edc280d:
temp_series=data['Q4'].value_counts()
labels=(np.array(temp_series.index))
sizes=(np.array((temp_series/temp_series.sum())*100))
trace=go.Pie(labels=labels, values=sizes, hole=0.5)
layout=go.Layout(title='Education distribution')
dataEducation=[trace]
fig=go.Figure(data=dataEducation, layout=layout)
py.iplot(fig, filename='Education')

source.7993a97f: Let's have a look in which industry most Kagglers are contributing their talent.
source.285b5d46: Most respondents are Students, Data Scientists, Software Engineers and Data Analysts. Interesting. Lets have some more fun.
source.c3b61caf: Top three industries are Computer/IT, Students and Educational Department. It means that most of the Kagglers are Tech geeks.
source.e40797fd: United States and India are on top of the List and far away from 3rd position i.e China. Fourth position is covered by the respondents who did not fill the field for Country.
source.c28c08aa: It is seen that, Most people are between age 25 and 29. In second number we have more people from range 22-24. It means that overall more are between age range 20-30. Lets look for some more insights.
source.917aff54: Data Scientists are said to be one of the most paying individuals. Let see what survey say about them.
source.66c5da1f: WoW.... It is seen that most respondents do not show their Salaries. Most people have salary between 0-10,000. Only 23 Kagglers have salary range between 400,000 and 500,000 interesting.... Lets explore some more.
source.84697459: **Check Back Soon, and Upvote if you enjoy it.**
source.9cfd4f77: Interesting..... Very interesting. Almost half of respondents have Master's Degree. One third of respondents have Bachelor's Degree. Almost 1/7th half of people have Doctorate Degree. In other 10% respondents, some have college degree, some with Professional degree and some do not prefer to tell.
source.e45b2ae2: It is seen that most of the respondents have Computer Science as their Major subject. Engineering and Staticians took 2nd and 3rd level respectively. We have also evaluate that what Kagglers use to describe themselves. Lets have some more interesting and fun insights.
